statements: SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM MalwareEvents WHERE correlation_score > 0.5
SELECT event_name, correlation_score FROM MalwareEvents ORDER BY correlation_score DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT AVG(correlation_score) AS average_score FROM MalwareEvents
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents WHERE correlation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY correlation_score ASC
SELECT event_name, correlation_score FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_name LIKE '%ransomware%' ORDER BY event_id
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_date > '2021-06-30' AND correlation_score < 0.5 ORDER BY event_id DESC
SELECT event_id, event_date, correlation_score FROM MalwareEvents WHERE correlation_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY event_date
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents;
SELECT event_date, malware_type FROM MalwareEvents WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT event_id, event_date, malware_type, threat_level FROM MalwareEvents WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT correlation_id, threat_category, related_malware_type FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE threat_category = 'Phishing';
SELECT event_id, event_date, malware_type, threat_level FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT malware_type, threat_level FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents JOIN ThreatIntelligence ON MalwareEvents.event_id = ThreatIntelligence.event_id;
SELECT MAX(event_id) AS max_event_id FROM MalwareEvents;
SELECT DISTINCT malware_type FROM MalwareEvents WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM MalwareEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT correlation_id, event_name, threat_name FROM Correlation JOIN MalwareEvents ON Correlation.event_id = MalwareEvents.event_id JOIN ThreatIntelligence ON Correlation.threat_id = ThreatIntelligence.threat_id;

SELECT event_name, threat_type, correlation_score FROM Correlation JOIN MalwareEvents ON Correlation.event_id = MalwareEvents.event_id JOIN ThreatIntelligence ON Correlation.threat_id = ThreatIntelligence.threat_id WHERE correlation_score > 0.8;
SELECT AVG(correlation_score) AS avg_score FROM Correlation;
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM MalwareEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT event_name, threat_name, correlation_score FROM MalwareEvents JOIN Correlation ON MalwareEvents.event_id = Correlation.event_id JOIN ThreatIntelligence ON Correlation.threat_id = ThreatIntelligence.threat_id;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM MalwareEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, threat_type FROM ThreatIntelligence GROUP BY threat_type ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareEvent;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM MalwareEvent ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, malware_type FROM MalwareEvent WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM Correlation JOIN EventCorrelation ON Correlation.correlation_id = EventCorrelation.correlation_id;
SELECT intel_source, intel_description FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE intel_source LIKE '%Firewall%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM MalwareEvent WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_date FROM MalwareEvent ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Correlation WHERE correlation_score > 0.8 AND correlation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT MalwareEvent.event_name, Correlation.correlation_score, ThreatIntelligence.intel_source FROM MalwareEvent JOIN Correlation ON MalwareEvent.event_id = Correlation.event_id JOIN EventCorrelation ON Correlation.correlation_id = EventCorrelation.correlation_id JOIN ThreatIntelligence ON EventCorrelation.intel_id = ThreatIntelligence.intel_id;
SELECT AVG(correlation_strength) AS avg_strength, COUNT(*) AS num_correlations FROM EventCorrelation WHERE is_matched = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM malware_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM malware_events;
SELECT event_description FROM malware_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM correlations ORDER BY correlation_score DESC;
SELECT threat_actor_name, threat_actor_organization FROM threat_actors;
SELECT * FROM malware_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM malware_events WHERE event_type = 'ransomware';
SELECT m.sample_name, t.threat_actor_name FROM malware_samples m JOIN threat_actors t ON m.threat_actor_id = t.threat_actor_id;
SELECT r.report_description, r.report_date, t.threat_actor_organization FROM incident_reports r JOIN threat_actors t ON r.threat_actor_id = t.threat_actor_id WHERE t.threat_actor_country = 'Russia';
SELECT c.correlation_id, m.sample_name, m.sample_hash, c.correlation_score FROM correlations c JOIN malware_samples m ON c.event_id = m.sample_id;
